data.title: Spectrasonics Release Omnisphere 2 With Exclusive Offer From Time+Space
data.meta_description: Today sees the launch of   Spectrasonics Omnisphere 2  , the follow up to the multi award winning virtual instrument Omnisphere.   Buy  Omnisphere 2 from Time+Space  and get a receive a free Omnisphere presets bundle from Audiority.
data.text:
Today sees the launch of Spectrasonics Omnisphere 2, the follow up to the multi award winning virtual instrument Omnisphere.

What Is In Omnisphere 2?

The upgrade includes the most requested Omnisphere feature: Audio import for user created soundsources, along with major new oscillator features including 100 times the number of DSP Oscillator waveforms, morphing Wavetables, new granular synthesis options, over 3,000 unique new sounds created by Spectrasonics acclaimed sound design team, 25 new FX units, an enhanced User Interface, and innovative production/browsing features like Sound Match™ to instantly locate any related sounds in the library, and Sound Lock™ to create endless useful patch variations by locking sound aspects while browsing other patches. Spectrasonics’ Founder and Creative Director Eric Persing told us...

Our biggest goal with Omnisphere 2 is to offer more freedom to create for every type of person using it,” states Spectrasonics’ Founder and Creative Director Eric Persing. “This is the first 'version 2' of any of our software instruments, and it's monumental! We had a blast creating all the features and sounds over many years and we can't wait to see what our users are inspired to do with Omnisphere 2.

Omnisphere 2 Pricing

Retail Price: £295/€399

Standard Upgrade Price: £149/€199

There will be a free grace period upgrade for any purchases of Omnisphere from October 2014 thru May 2015.

Buy Omnisphere 2 from Time+Space and get a receive a free Omnisphere presets bundle from Audiority.

Omnisphere 2 New Features Overview:

Audio Import - Use your own audio file as a soundsource in Omnisphere

Over 400 New DSP Waveforms for the Synth Oscillator - an increase of 100X

Wavetable Synthesis - Each Waveform is now a Morphing Wavetable

Powerful New Granular Synthesis algorithm

Deeper FM/Ring Mod capabilities for aggressive timbres

8 New Filter Types - New Power Filters, Vowel, Resonators

New Unison Drift models Analog Polysynth behavior

Expanded Modulation with new sources and many more targets

Polyphonic LFO and Modulation Envelope options

Soundsource Reversing

Now includes over 10,000 sounds

More than 3,000 New patches and soundsources from acclaimed Spectrasonics Sound Design Team

New Omnisphere EDM library with cutting-edge, modern sounds

New Exclusive Soundsources from Diego Stocco's Custom Built Instruments

New category of Phrase-based Soundsources for granular synthesis

Hundreds of new Circuit Bent Soundsources

Many Innovative new Psychoacoustic Soundsources

New Melodic Cave Stalactites Soundsources

New Interface:

Redesigned Wider User Interface with many improvements

New Show Modulation pane opens modulation routings/sources on left side

New Mini-Browser available at all times

Larger Full Browser Design

There is so much more to share about Omnisphere 2. Check it all out at the Omnisphere 2 pages on Time+Space and don't forget if you buy Omnisphere 2 from them you will get a free Omnisphere presets bundle from Audiority.
